ValueEntry.Name: Resin Bomb Fabricator
ValueEntry.Description: Take a quantity of liquid resin, pack it full of incendiary materials, dump in a bunch of power, and light it off to destroy large quantities of soft resin.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Resin Bomber Falcor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Drops resin-blasting bombs onto patches of soft resin, clearing it out. Does not harm worms already in the resin.

ValueEntry.Name: Resin Bomber FALCOR
ValueEntry.Description: Drops resin-blasting bombs onto patches of soft resin, clearing it out. Does not harm worms already in the resin.
